title: Sang Hyang Dedari Dance Experience (Half-day)
overview: Witness the mystical Sang Hyang Dedari trance dance, a sacred Balinese performance.

stops.description: Arrive and observe the Sang Hyang Dedari trance dance.

title: Sang Hyang Dedari Dance & Workshop (Full-day)
overview: A full day with the Sang Hyang Dedari trance dance, including a performance and cultural workshop.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Sang Hyang Dedari trance dance.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about the Sang Hyang Dedari dance.
